name: Illusia chapters 1 and 2
description: please concider donating to this project as more will be released in the coming weeks, if you like chapter 1 and 2, you'll love chapter 3 and so on! Packed as a rare to contain all files, long story filled RPG with choices affecting the story, many characters come and go with dozens of monsters and hundreds of items replayability due to story changes based on the choices made, follow the prince or princess of demons throughout their journey
